patthana16.85:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.85:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho napītisahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.85:1.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.85:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
